item.title: Gueye red card appeal rejected with 'no reason' given
item.description: The Football Association rejected Everton's appeal against Idrissa Gueye's red card without providing an explanation, David Moyes says.

item.title: 'Business rates changes will cost me Â£62,000'
item.description: Pub bosses have warned they face a sharp rise in business rates bills despite government support.

item.title: Romanian teens accused of rape attempt that sparked riots in NI have charges dropped
item.description: The boys, aged 14 and 15, have been in custody since the alleged assault on 7 June which led to race riots across NI.

item.title: Zelensky's chief of staff resigns after Ukrainian anti-corruption police raid home
item.description: Yermak, 54, has been Zelensky's closest adviser throughout Russia's full-scale war.

item.title: Search for British man who fell from cruise ship off Tenerife coast
item.description: The Spanish coastguard has been coordinating search and rescue efforts since Thursday morning.
